GENERAL_CATEGORY.LABEL: General
GENERAL_CATEGORY.DESC: Use when you're unsure; describe your need in detail.

FOOD_ASSISTANCE.DESC: Find food banks, pantries, or meal programs.

GROCERY_SHOPPING_AND_DELIVERY.DESC: Request help shopping for and delivering groceries.

COOKING_HELP.LABEL: Cooking Help
COOKING_HELP.DESC: Get guidance with meal prep and cooking.

CLOTHING_ASSISTANCE.LABEL: Clothing Assistance
CLOTHING_ASSISTANCE.DESC: Donate, borrow, tailor, or request clothing help.

DONATE_CLOTHES.LABEL: Donate Clothes
DONATE_CLOTHES.DESC: Give clothing to those in need.

EMERGENCY_CLOTHING_ASSISTANCE.LABEL: Emergency Clothing Assistance
EMERGENCY_CLOTHING_ASSISTANCE.DESC: Rapid clothing support for urgent situations.

HOUSING_ASSISTANCE.LABEL: Housing Assistance
HOUSING_ASSISTANCE.DESC: Renting, moving, and household setup support.

LEASE_SUPPORT.LABEL: Lease Support
LEASE_SUPPORT.DESC: Help understanding lease terms and requirements.

TENANT_RENT_SUPPORT.LABEL: Tenant Rent Support
TENANT_RENT_SUPPORT.DESC: Guidance when you're struggling with rent.

REPAIR_MAINTENANCE_SUPPORT.LABEL: Repair & Maintenance Support
REPAIR_MAINTENANCE_SUPPORT.DESC: Assistance scheduling basic repairs or maintenance.

UTILITIES_SETUP_SUPPORT.LABEL: Utilities Setup Support
UTILITIES_SETUP_SUPPORT.DESC: Help setting up internet, electricity, or other utilities.

FIND_ROOMATE.LABEL: Find a Roommate
FIND_ROOMATE.DESC: Match with roommates or shared housing.

MOVE_IN_HELP.LABEL: Move-in Help
MOVE_IN_HELP.DESC: Hands-on help packing, lifting, or unpacking.

BUY_THINGS.LABEL: Buy Household Items
BUY_THINGS.DESC: Help sourcing furniture and household essentials.

SELL_THINGS.LABEL: Sell Household Items
SELL_THINGS.DESC: Get support listing or donating items you no longer need.

EDUCATION_CAREER_SUPPORT.LABEL: Education & Career Support
EDUCATION_CAREER_SUPPORT.DESC: College apps, SOP reviews, tutoring, and study support.

SCHOLARSHIP_KNOWLEDGE.LABEL: Scholarship Knowledge
SCHOLARSHIP_KNOWLEDGE.DESC: Share information on scholarships and grants.

STUDY_GROUP_FORMATION.LABEL: Study Group Formation
STUDY_GROUP_FORMATION.DESC: Find or organize collaborative study groups.

CAREER_GUIDANCE.LABEL: Career Guidance
CAREER_GUIDANCE.DESC: Career path planning, resume, and interview support.

EDUCATION_RESOURCE_SHARING.LABEL: Education Resource Sharing
EDUCATION_RESOURCE_SHARING.DESC: Share notes, recordings, or practice material.

HEALTHCARE_AND_WELLNESS.LABEL: Healthcare & Wellness
HEALTHCARE_AND_WELLNESS.DESC: Non-clinical medical guidance, reminders, and wellbeing support.

MEDICAL_CONSULTATION.LABEL: Medical Consultation
MEDICAL_CONSULTATION.DESC: Help coordinating tele-consults or basic medical info.

MEDICINE_DELIVERY.LABEL: Medicine Delivery
MEDICINE_DELIVERY.DESC: Pickup and delivery of OTC medicines.

ELDERLY_COMMUNITY_ASSISTANCE.LABEL: Elderly Community Assistance
ELDERLY_COMMUNITY_ASSISTANCE.DESC: Non-medical support for seniors, caregivers, and communities.

SENIOR_RELOCATION_SUPPORT.LABEL: Senior Relocation Support
SENIOR_RELOCATION_SUPPORT.DESC: Plan moves between homes or care facilities.

MEDICATION_MANAGEMENT.LABEL: Medication Management
MEDICATION_MANAGEMENT.DESC: Ensure schedules, reminders, and storage are on track.

MEDICAL_DEVICES_SETUP.LABEL: Medical Devices Setup
MEDICAL_DEVICES_SETUP.DESC: Set up or troubleshoot medical and assistive devices.

ERRANDS_EVENTS_TRANSPORTATION.LABEL: Errands, Events & Transportation
ERRANDS_EVENTS_TRANSPORTATION.DESC: Escort seniors to errands or special events.

TRANSPORTATION_APPOINTMENTS_EVENTS.LABEL: Transportation for Appointments
TRANSPORTATION_APPOINTMENTS_EVENTS.DESC: Arrange rides to appointments and gatherings.

SCHEDULING_APPOINTMENTS_OR_TASKS.LABEL: Scheduling Appointments or Tasks
SCHEDULING_APPOINTMENTS_OR_TASKS.DESC: Keep track of appointments, refills, and chores.

MEAL_SUPPORT.LABEL: Meal Support
MEAL_SUPPORT.DESC: Help with meal preparation and cooking.
